name: Sugar Cane's Sky
description:
Sugar Cane's Sky is a simple, straight-forward, puzzle game. You have to drag the candy canes to the correct colored spots. It is inspired by the SNES Goof Troop's puzzles. It was also a test for procedurally generated puzzles: all 50 levels were procedurally generated, but hand picked, to ensure quality.

It's available for windows 64 bits and Android.
